channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: 英国の放送作家、マイケル・パーキンソン卿が88歳で死去。彼のTVキャリアは70年に及び、番組では世界の大スターにインタビューしていた（Steven McIntosh/BBC）
item.description:
Steven McIntosh / BBC:
UK broadcaster Sir Michael Parkinson has died at the age of 88; his TV career spanned seven decades, and he interviewed the world's biggest stars on his show  —  Broadcaster Sir Michael Parkinson has died at the age of 88, his family has confirmed.  —  His TV career spanned seven decades …

item.title: クロスフィットのメディアチームが毎年制作するクロスフィット・ゲームズに関するドキュメンタリーは、ニッチなフィットネス・コミュニティの視聴者層により、ストリーミング配信でコンスタントにヒットしている（Calum Marsh/New York Times）
item.description:
Calum Marsh / New York Times:
Documentaries about the annual CrossFit Games from CrossFit's media team have become consistent streaming hits due to their niche fitness community audience  —  A series of films about the annual CrossFit Games, enthusiastically embraced by the niche fitness community, have become surprise hits on streaming platforms.

item.title: アルゴリズムがどのように機能するのか、この機能が実際に偏向と戦うのか、そして高額賞金の場面での使用など、Xのコミュニティ・ノートを深く掘り下げる（Vitalik Buterin／ヴィタリック・ブテリンのウェブサイト）
item.description:
Vitalik Buterin / Vitalik Buterin's website:
A deep dive into X's Community Notes, including how the algorithm works, whether the feature actually fights polarization, and its use in high-stakes situations  —  Special thanks to Dennis Pourteaux and Jay Baxter for feedback and review.  —  The last two years of Twitter X have been tumultuous, to say the least.

item.title: Maddi MooやStraw Hat Goofyのような "MovieTok "インフルエンサーは、TikTok上で映画の批評、分析、宣伝によって何百万人もの人々にリーチしている（Reggie Ugwu/New York Times）。
item.description:
Reggie Ugwu / New York Times:
A look at “MovieTok” influencers like Maddi Moo and Straw Hat Goofy, who reach millions of people on TikTok by reviewing, analyzing, or promoting movies  —  On MovieTok, reviewers can reach an audience of millions and earn tens of thousands of dollars per post.  “Critics,” they say, are old news.

item.title: ストリーミングコンテンツにClassPassモデルを採用し、マイケル・アイズナーの投資会社が支援していたアグリゲーターStruumは、2022年6月にひっそりと閉鎖された（Matthew Keys/The Desk）
item.description:
Matthew Keys / The Desk:
Struum, an aggregator that used a ClassPass model for streaming content and was backed by Michael Eisner's investment firm, quietly shut down in June 2022  —  The service ran out of cash in June 2022, and quietly dismantled from that point on.  —  The service ran out of cash in June 2022, and quietly dismantled from that point on.

item.title: ブランドの安全性を保証した6日後、Xは親ヒトラー派のアカウントにThe Athletic、MLB、USA Todayなどの広告を掲載し、その後アカウントを停止した（Eric Hananoki/Media Matters for America）
item.description:
Eric Hananoki / Media Matters for America:
Six days after making brand safety assurances, X placed ads for The Athletic, MLB, USA Today, and others on a pro-Hitler account, before suspending the account  —  Following Media Matters' report, X finally suspended the account  —  Update 2 (8/16/23, 8:15 p.m.): CNN's Clare Duffy …

item.title: 情報筋パラマウント、BET Media株の過半数売却計画を取り下げ、売却はバランスシートのデレバレッジにつながらないと結論（Jessica Toonkel/Wall Street Journal）
item.description:
Jessica Toonkel / Wall Street Journal:
Sources: Paramount drops its plans to sell a majority stake in BET Media, concluding that a sale wouldn't lead to a meaningful deleveraging of its balance sheet  —  The entertainment conglomerate concluded a sale wouldn't result in any meaningful deleveraging of its balance sheet.

item.title: ハズブロ、ハズブロ・エンタテインメントのトップに元eOne幹部3名を指名：オリヴィエ・デュモンが社長、ゼヴ・フォアマンが映画部門、ガブリエル・マラーノがTV部門に就任。
item.description:
The Hollywood Reporter:
Hasbro names three former eOne execs to lead Hasbro Entertainment: Olivier Dumont as president, Zev Foreman as head of film, and Gabriel Marano as head of TV  —  Olivier Dumont becomes president of Hasbro Entertainment, while Zev Foreman and Gabriel Marano will head up film and TV divisions, respectively.

item.title: 情報筋ニューヨーク・タイムズの弁護士は、ライセンス契約の可能性をめぐる緊迫した交渉の後、報道機関の知的財産権を保護するためにOpenAIを訴えることを検討している（Bobby Allyn/NPR）
item.description:
Bobby Allyn / NPR:
Sources: The New York Times' lawyers are exploring suing OpenAI to protect the news outlet's IP rights, after tense negotiations over a potential licensing deal  —  The New York Times and OpenAI could end up in court.  —  Lawyers for the newspaper are exploring whether to sue OpenAI …

item.title: ハーブ・アルパートとA&Mレコードを共同設立したジェリー・モスが88歳で死去、同レーベルはカーペンターズ、ポリス、スティックス、ジャネット・ジャクソンらと契約（Stephen Thomas Erlewine/Los Angeles Times）
item.description:
Stephen Thomas Erlewine / Los Angeles Times:
Jerry Moss, who co-founded A&M Records with Herb Alpert, dies at 88; his label signed the Carpenters, the Police, Styx, Janet Jackson, and more  —  Homepage News  —  Jerry Moss, the record executive who was the “M” in the seminal West Coast label A&M Records, has died.  He was 88.

item.title: ダイヤモンド・スポーツがシンクレア社を提訴、同社がダイヤモンドから15億ドル以上を吸い上げたとし、シンクレア社トップがダイヤモンドから管理料を "搾取 "するつもりだったとの証言を引用（Jonathan Randles/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Jonathan Randles / Bloomberg:
Diamond Sports sues Sinclair, saying it siphoned $1.5B+ from Diamond and cites testimony that Sinclair's top exec planned to “milk” Diamond via management fees  —  - Sinclair subsidiary claims it had to pay high management fees  — Broadcaster says it struggled soon after Sinclair deal closed

item.title: YouTubeチャンネル「Linus Tech Tips」が、窃盗、倫理違反、セクハラの告発を受けて制作を一時停止、外部の調査員を雇う予定（Alex Cranz/The Verge）
item.description:
Alex Cranz / The Verge:
YouTube channel Linus Tech Tips pauses production after accusations of theft, ethical lapses, and sexual harassment, and plans to hire an outside investigator  —  Linus Sebastian's Linus Media Group YouTube empire is currently in crisis, with accusations of theft, lapses in ethics, and most recently, allegations of sexual harassment.

item.title: 保守派ラジオ司会者グレン・ベック氏によると、グレン・ベック・プログラムの全エピソードがApple Podcastsから削除され、その後「何の説明もなく」復活したとのこと（Candice Ortiz/Mediaite）
item.description:
Candice Ortiz / Mediaite:
Conservative radio host Glenn Beck says all Glenn Beck Program episodes were removed from Apple Podcasts, and then restored, “with no explanation”  —  Commentator Glenn Beck's entire show was removed from Apple's podcast network on Wednesday, allegedly without warning or explanation.

item.title: 申請中：NYT、カリフォルニア州の「年齢相応のデザインコード法」と闘うテック企業に参加、同法は報道機関や未成年者の憲法修正第1条の権利を害するとして（Max Tani/Semafor）
item.description:
Max Tani / Semafor:
Filing: The NYT joins tech companies fighting California's Age-Appropriate Design Code Act, saying the law harms news outlets and minors' First Amendment rights  —  The Scoop  —  The New York Times Company is joining tech companies in an attempt to block a new children's online safety law …

item.title: AP通信社、ジェネレーティブAIツールの使用方法に関するガイダンスを発表、アウトプットは「未検証のソース資料」のようなものだとしてスタイルブックの更新を計画（Alex Mahadevan/Poynter）
item.description:
Alex Mahadevan / Poynter:
The AP releases guidance on how the news agency uses generative AI tools and plans to update its stylebook, saying outputs are like “unvetted source material”  —  Weeks after announcing a partnership with OpenAI, The Associated Press urges caution in using — and reporting on — generative AI tools.
